answers.text:
Barbara, 
The New Hampshire Local Government Center, which is home to the New Hampshire Municipal Association, has been using the portfolio manager since 2008.  You can contact them at (603)224-7447 to find out what their experience has been.


Barbara,

author: Unknown
text:
Are you using ENERGY STAR's portfolio manager, an interactive energy management tool that allows you to track and assess energy and water consumption across your entire portfolio of buildings? If so, what has been your experience with it?
If you're interested in learning more about portfolio manager, check the link below:
http://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=evaluate_performance.bus_portfoliomanager
title: Portfolio Manager
